name: aws-tileserver
description: AWS lambda function to handle vectortile queries via REST

scripts.sim: tsc && PGUSER=postgres PGHOST=127.0.0.1 PGDATABASE=slice PGPORT=5432 node_modules/lambda-local/bin/lambda-local -l dist/index.js -h handler -e test/mering.js
scripts.predeploy: tsc && rm ./dist/*.zip && zip -j ./dist/function.zip ./dist/*.js && cd tileserver_layer && zip -qr ../dist/tileserver_layer.zip nodejs

author: Henry Thasler
